name: Project Angel - Team 2
description:
You are a guardian angel, but the person you're guarding is a complete dumbass who always finds himself in dangerous situations and never pays attention to anything other than their phone. It's up to you to protect him by moving objects around the level to steer them away from traps and towards the goal.

Arrow keys or wasd to move

Spacebar to pickup/place objects

Q to return to the main menu
